Name: Create Scheduled Tasks From XML
Description: This will create a schedule task based on exported xml. See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb736357%28v=vs.85%29.aspx for instructions on how to export scheduled tasks as xml.
Author: josh3ennett

Parameters.Name: xmlFileName
Parameters.Label: Xml File List
Parameters.HelpText: A list of XML files, separated by ';', containing the scheduled tasks to create.

Parameters.Name: username
Parameters.Label: User Name
Parameters.HelpText: The User that the task will run as

Parameters.Name: password
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password of the user the task will run as
